1: <pb/><t>¡Nimalaj quicotemal</t> <t>aretak cäbix chwe:</t> <t>“Jo' chupam ri rachoch ri Ajawaxel!”</t>
3: <t>Jerusalen,</t> <t>tinimit ri yacom</t> <t>rech quemulix ri tinimit winak chupam.</t>
4: <t>Chila' quebopan wi tak</t> <t>ri ramak' ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>che u k'ijilaxic ri u bi',</t> <t>jacha' ri takanic ri yo'm che ri Israel.</t>
5: <t>Chupam e c'o wi</t> <t>ri k'atbal tzij re suq'uil,</t> <t>ri k'atbal tak tzij</t> <t>re ri rachoch ri ajawinel David.</t>
6: <t>Chibij ruc' ronojel iwanima':</t> <t>“Chc'ol jamaril awuc', Jerusalen;</t> <t>ma ta c'o cäyo'w latz'</t> <t>chque ri catquilok'ok'ej.</t>
7: <t>Chc'ol jamaril pa tak ri e a tapia;</t> <t>ma ta c'o chc'ulmax</t> <t>chquipam tak ri nimak tak awachoch.”</t>
8: <pb/><t>Are c'u ri camic cumal ri e wachalal</t> <t>xukuje' ri e wachil quinbij na:</t> <t>“Chi chc'ol jamaril awuc'.</t>
9: <t>Rumal rech ri rachoch ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ri ka Dios,</t> <t>quintzucuj u banic utzil chawe.”</t>
